description:
Looking like they just stepped off the pages of an early ‘90s National Geographic magazine, these sunnies bring a little glacial cool to your everyday life. With features you'd expect to find in a pair of glacier glasses, but lenses that are light enough to use every day, the Cham offer a great balance of coverage and real-world usability.

  • Removable side-shields protect your eyes from all angles
  • Rubber grips on the temples and nose bridge reduce slippage
  • Long adjustable temples help to keep the glasses locked on your head
  • Polarized lenses cut through reflections, great for use around water, snow, pavement and anywhere else glare lies in wait
  • Flash lens coatings increase contrast
  • Category 3 lenses offering great versatility and protection, they are intended for everyday activities but would be too bright for glacier use
  • 6-base ARC lens curve minimizes distortion
name: Julbo Cham Polarized Sunglasses - Unisex
